document_data.name: Llewellyn Longhand
document_data.mainbody: '''Lord Llewellyn Longhand''' was the military commander of [[Daggerford]] during much of the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Llewellyn was the leader of the [[Daggerford militia|army of Daggerford]]. Once he had dreamed of ruling the duchy but changed his mind and continued his loyal service to Duke [[Pwyll Greatshout]].
document_data.Relationship: Unknown to almost everyone besides himself, Llewellyn was the bastard son of Duke Conan Daggerford.
